name: Snow Poke
description:
Employ your snowmen brethren as you race against your inevitable demise! The only thing a snowman has are his best friends <3

Instructions

  • Use WASD or the Arrow Keys to move
  • Don't hit the hazards
  • Collect snowballs to create more snowmen!
  • Gifts grant Shields
  • Press escape to exit to menu

Try your luck on the online leaderboards!!
